hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(ts|tsx|js|jsx)$ ]]; then pnpm biome format --write "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q 'src/layers/domain/'; then if grep -qE 'from.*layers/(application|infrastructure|presentation)' "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; then echo 'WARNING: Domain層が上位層に依存しています！'; fi; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q 'UseCase\.ts$'; then if ! grep -q 'Promise<Result<' "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; then echo 'REMINDER: UseCaseはResult型を返却してください'; fi; fi
